862970.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost: Web of Deceit (Savage Worlds)
862970.description:
Hellfrost: Web of Deceit

Don't get caught in this tangled web of deceit!
A strange shadow has fallen over the normally quiet village of Rushton. The villagers have been acting strangely, with some disappearing for days at a time and a few families missing entirely!
Behind these strange occurrences is an unearthly creature, part-human and part-spider. This creatures venom enslaves the weak minded and the it plans to enslave the whole of Rushton and beyond!
Can the heroes defeat this malevolent evil? In Web of Deceit the heroes will be fully tested in this exciting adventure for Hellfrost!
Within this product you will find:
  • 8 Ready to use encounters
  • 42 Story entries that describe the action
  • 14 images and maps
  • 34 NPCs and Monsters to challenge your players
  • Rollable tables for relics, rumors and opinions, trapdoor lair treasure, and wandering monsters
Includes the Bonus Material in the Matters of Faith Web Update
This book is designed for use in conjunction with the Hellfrost Players Guide and Hellfrost Bestiary, and Hellfrost Hedge Magic.
Author: Paul 'Wiggy' Wade-Williams
Artists: Dimitri Bielak, Pawel Grabowski
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
